title: Sri Lanka: Two Ministries for Technology, Investment, Women, Child Affairs
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa issued an Extraordinary Gazette on Thursday (9) declaring the creation of the Minister of Technology and Investment Promotion & Minister of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment.
15 institutions have been placed under the Minister of Technology and Investment Promotion, and they are the following:
3. Telecommunication Regulatory Commission of Sri Lanka and Allied Institutions
6. Sri Lanka Telecom and its Subsidiaries and Allied Institutions
15 institutions have been placed under the Minister of Women, Child Affairs and Social Empowerment, and they are the following:
14. National Council for Elders and National Secretariat for Elders
